name: Text Editor In Selection
description:
The text of the text nodes in the selection can be edited together from the plug-in window.


Precautions for use

After creating the text node, edit the name to something analog and easy to understand. If you don't, the name of the text node will change every time you edit the text, and it will not work properly.


How to use

  1. Select Frame, Group, Component, etc
  2. Activate the plugin
  3. Edit the text from the window
